title: Kaweco Perkeo Rollerball Pen—Jungle Green
description:
The Kaweco Perkeo Rollerball Jungle Green offers a modern design for your start in the world of handwriting no matter what age. Visually, the octagonal cap and the 16-sided barrel harmonize perfectly with each other, as the surfaces at the different angles create a unique play of light and shadow.

But the Kaweco Perkeo Jungle Green has more to offer than just its look: The ergonomic grip section and its low weight support the posture and allow fatigue-proof writing fun. The Rollerball is ideal for beginners in school or in the field of high-quality writing. This pen brings that tropical feeling straight to your desk. The natural-looking green sharpens the senses and stimulates creativity.
  • Open Dimensions: 6.1 in.
  • Closed Dimensions: 5.5 in.
  • Materials: Rollerball writing system
